Class tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop

The superclass changed from tripleplay.ui.Layout.Constraint to java.lang.Object.

Added Constructors
MenuHost.Pop(Element<?>, Menu, Position) Creates a new event and initializes .trigger and .menu.
 

Added Methods
MenuHost popup() Pops up this instance on the trigger's root's menu host.
 

Changed Methods
Pop atEventPos(Position) Now deprecated.
 use TRIGGER_POINT
Pop atLayerX(Layer, float) Now deprecated.
 use TRIGGER_POINT
Pop atLayerY(Layer, float) Now deprecated.
 use TRIGGER_POINT
Pop atScreenPos(float, float) Now deprecated.
 use TRIGGER_POINT
Pop halign(HAlign) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN
Pop toBottom(float) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
Pop toLeft(float) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
Pop toRight(float) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
Pop toTop(float) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
Pop valign(VAlign) Now deprecated.
 use POPUP_ORIGIN

Added Fields
